attributes.action: Demand that all scientific data pertaining to climate change, together with computer codes used to analyze that data be published on an official UK Government internet site, so that the AGW "debate" can be examined, and commented on by any UK citizen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The scientific "debate" on climate change, has been conducted behind closed doors (specifically those of the IPCC). The supposed scientific "concensus" has never been tested properly in a public arena. These things don't matter. What matters is that that data and workings of the IPCC must be made public. They shouldn't be kept secret. If IPCC are so sure that they have the right answer, then let them publish, in the open literature, every last detail of their theory, and its basis.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
